author: andschwa
body:
In a recent update to CLI, stability has become quite an issue. The following error can occur (at various times):

```
Unhandled Exception: 

C:\Users\appveyor\AppData\Local\Microsoft\dotnet\cli\bin\dotnet.exe compile-csc @C:\projects\powershell-linux\src\Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure\obj\Debug\net451\dotnet-compile.rsp returned Exit Code -1073741819
```

But re-running the build can be successful.

Following dotnet/cli#1171.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Version 1.0.0.001425 is good (I didn't see any problem with it)

title: Intermittent Windows build failure (dotnet cli)
